structure.unit: A AUTOMATED MOTOR VEHICLE REGISTRATION SYSTEM

law.catch_line: Forms used when transferring vehicle or trailer.
law.text: The Department of Vehicle Regulation shall establish appropriate forms and procedures to be utilized in connection with the transfer of a motor vehicle or trailer by operation of law.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 164, sec. 42, effective July 15, 1982.
